entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 12:17 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
